eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Cass, MI; AT 06:45 AM ON OCT 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 07:00 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a required weekly test of the Emergency Alert System for Cass County Michigan. This is only a test. No action required
